attributes.action: Compel all parents with children currently in state schools to spend one week a year working in a school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The increasing tendency amongst members of the public to blame teachers for the lack of success of students in school and the general lack of discipline in society, whilst absolving themselves of any responsibility for those things, would be reversed if those same people had to spend a short period of time working in a school. The Prime Minister should tell the public to support teachers, discipline their own offspring all of the time, not just when they get round to it, and set an example to those same children by eating less, exercising more and showing respect for authority.
